In this session of **MA1034Eng** the objectives are:


* Describe the process of diagonalization of matrices. <br/><br/>
* Apply diagonalization to linear transformations. <br/><br/>
* Understand the significance of diagonalization in simplifying matrix operations. <br/><br/>
